derivation: a primitive root; also denominative from H6288 (פְּאֹרָה),
outline:
1. to glorify, beautify, adorn
    1. (Piel) to glorify, beautify
    2. (Hithpael)
      1. to glorify oneself
      2. to get glory to oneself, be glorified
    3. (Piel) to go over the boughs
kjv_def: beautify, boast self, go over the boughs, glorify (self), glory, vaunt self.
strongs_def: to gleam, i.e. (causatively) embellish; figuratively, to boast; also to explain (i.e. make clear) oneself; to shake a tree
